English: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)

d.f: `眼球~`內~`的~`一層~`薄膜~。`位於~`鞏膜~`和~`視網膜~`之~`間~，`由~`結締組織~`構成~，`含~`黑色素~，`能~`吸收~`光線~`以~`隔絕~`鞏膜~`內外~`的~`光線~，`血管~`甚~`多~，`可~`提供~`眼球~`養分~。

English: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
